Reviews.Title: My Grandchildren loved this camera it gives wonderful pictures underwater.
Reviews.Author: Pam  Molthen
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent purchase.  Batteries last well.  Attachment keeps it floating. You just need a a nice bag to keep all its parts together.

Reviews.Title: Not great but good
Reviews.Author: Drigerman
Reviews.Content: Not a high budget camera but it's waterproof.  Hard to see the screen in bright sunlight.  Takes good pics.  When zoomed in the pics become grainy.
